attributes.action: Stop Apple Locking The iPhone To O2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, if you buy the iPhone you have to take up a contract with O2. If you try to unlock your iPhone for use with another network you invalidate the warranty. This petition is to stop Apple locking the iPhone to the O2 network and let the other networks sell this handset as well

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
